channel.title: SourceForge.net: SF.net Project News: CD-Rom Control
channel.description: SF.net Project News: CD-Rom Control (crcontrol project) - The CD-Rom Control is an X Window control panel which eases the use of the cd-rom drive. It allows you to mount, eject/umount, the cd-rom drive at the click of a button.Other features include autostart and cd status checking.
